sitename: Ayurvedic Panchkarma by BAMS Ayurvedic Doctor
cleaned_text: Chiropractic Chiropractic is a manual therapy for bone adjustment . It's help to improve your body alignment . It mainly work on your spine . Use full for * Muscle relaxation, instant relief from pain. * Muscle stiffness. * Release tension between the ligament and tendon. Chirotherapy also called bone setting therapy. The person who done this therapy called chiropractor. It work on musculoskeletal system. Chirotherapy is beneficial for spine problem , neuro problem , Frozen shoulder , Cervical numbness knee pain ,AVN etc . Chirotherapy is safe and effective. In our center we mix both the pathy ancient ayurvedic and chirotherapy for much. Better result.
